titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to transfer public lands for the purposes of providing affordable housing.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H2602-2603)
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 5/20/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to transfer public lands to public housing agencies to provide affordable public housing.
